nandagopā： nandagopā（thī）
နန္ဒဂေါပါ（ထီ）
[nanda+gopā]
[နန္ဒ+ဂေါပါ]

Nandagopā：A serving woman of Devagabbhā．

Her husband was Andhakavenu．She bore ten daughters，their births coinciding with those of ten sons to Devagabbhā，and exchanged her daughters for the latter’s sons．

These，because they were adopted by her husband，came to be known asAndhavenhudāsaputtā．J．iv．79ff．

nandagopā：နန္ဒဂေါပါ（ထီ）
[နန္ဒ+ဂေါပါ]
နန္ဒဂေါပါမည်သော အလုပ်အကျွေးမ။
